info.name: MyPOSCore API
info.description:
Collection untuk MyPOSCore Backend API - Multi-tenant & Multi-branch POS System

Features:
- Multi-tenancy support dengan tenant code
- Multi-branch per tenant dengan branch code
- JWT authentication (24h expiry)
- User management per branch
- Role-based access control (superadmin, tenantadmin, branchadmin, staff)
- Product & Inventory management
- Order & Payment processing
- FAQ & Terms & Conditions management
- Superadmin management panel

Architecture:
- Separate services: RegisterService & LoginService
- Clean architecture with handlers, services, models
- PostgreSQL database with GORM
- Gin web framework

Roles:
- superadmin: Full system access, manage tenants, FAQ & TnC
- tenantadmin: Manage tenant-level resources
- branchadmin: Manage branch-level resources
- user: Regular user access

Public Endpoints:
- /health - Health check
- /dev/tenants - List all tenants (for testing)
- /api/v1/faq - FAQ endpoints (public read access)
- /api/v1/tnc - Terms & Conditions endpoints (public read access)

request.description:
Get list of all tenants in the system with pagination support.

**Authentication:** Required - Bearer token
**Access:** All authenticated users

Query Parameters:
- page (optional): Page number, default 1
- page_size (optional): Items per page, default 32

Response includes pagination metadata:
- page: Current page number
- page_size: Items per page
- total_items: Total number of tenants
- total_pages: Total number of pages
- data: Array of tenant items with complete details

request.description:
Create a new branch in user's tenant. Branch will be automatically assigned to tenant_id from JWT token.

**Authentication:** Required - Bearer token
**Access:** All authenticated users
**Tenant Assignment:** Automatic from JWT token

Supports:
- Multipart form data with image upload
- Image formats: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp
- Max file size: 5MB
- Image field is optional

Required fields:
- name: Branch name (string, required)

Optional fields:
- description: Branch description
- address: Physical address
- website: Branch website URL
- email: Contact email
- phone: Contact phone
- is_active: Active status (boolean, default: true)
- image: Branch logo/image file

request.description:
Get list of all product categories for the authenticated tenant with pagination support. Categories are automatically filtered by tenant_id from JWT token.

Query Parameters:
- page (optional): Page number, default 1
- page_size (optional): Items per page, default 32
- active_only (optional): Set to 'true' to show only active categories

Response includes pagination metadata:
- page: Current page number
- page_size: Items per page
- total_items: Total number of items
- total_pages: Total number of pages
- data: Array of category items

request.description:

- page (optional): Page number, default 1
- page_size (optional): Items per page, default 32
- search (optional): Search keyword in name, description, or SKU (case-insensitive)

Response includes pagination metadata:
- page: Current page number
- page_size: Items per page
- total_items: Total number of items
- total_pages: Total number of pages
- data: Array of product items

Examples:
- All products page 1: /products?page=1&page_size=32
- By search: /products?search=ayam&page=1

request.description:
Create payment for an order. Payment amount must be equal to or greater than order total.

Request body:
- order_id: ID of order to pay
- amount: Payment amount (must be >= order total)
- payment_method: Method of payment (cash, card, transfer, qris)
- notes: Optional payment notes

Effect:
- Creates payment record
- Updates order status to 'completed'
- Cannot pay cancelled orders
- Cannot pay already completed orders

Response includes complete payment details for receipt:
- Payment information (ID, amount, method, change)
- Order details (order number, total, items)
- Product details (name, quantity, price, subtotal)
- Cashier and branch information

request.description:
Create a new user with OPTIONAL profile image upload. User will be automatically assigned to tenant_id from JWT token.

**Required Fields:**
- email: valid email format, globally unique
- password: min 6 characters
- full_name: user's full name
- role: staff | branchadmin | tenantadmin
- branch_id: must exist and belong to tenant
- is_active: true | false

**Optional Fields:**
- image: Profile image file (JPEG/PNG). Image will be uploaded to /uploads/profiles/

**How to test in Postman:**
1. Select 'image' field
2. Click 'Select Files'
3. Choose a JPEG/PNG image from your computer
4. Send request

**Response will include:**
- image: URL of uploaded image (e.g., "uploads/profiles/user_10_1234567890.jpg")
- OR null if no image was uploaded

request.description:
Update an existing user with OPTIONAL profile image replacement. Replace '1' in URL with actual user ID. User must belong to authenticated tenant.

**All fields are OPTIONAL - only send what you want to update:**
- full_name: User's full name
- role: staff | branchadmin | tenantadmin
- is_active: true | false
- password: New password (will be hashed)
- branch_id: New branch assignment
- image: New profile image (JPEG/PNG). Will REPLACE existing image.

**Partial Update Examples:**

1. **Update only name:**
   - Send only: full_name

2. **Update only image:**
   - Send only: image (file)

3. **Update name + image:**
   - Send: full_name + image

**How to test in Postman:**
1. Enable/disable fields you want to update
2. For image: Select 'image' field → Click 'Select Files'
3. Choose JPEG/PNG from your computer
4. Send request

**Response will include:**
- Updated user data with new image URL if uploaded

- PIN must be exactly 6 digits
- PIN must be numeric only
- PIN and confirm_pin must match
- Admin role must be higher than target user role
- Tenant isolation for non-superadmin
- Branch isolation for owner
